sectionDescription: Here are some of my recent projects. Click on any card to learn more.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.shortDescription: A website to catalog my projects. It's The very site you're on right now!
projects.description: A nice sleek website I made to display my projects and to blog about my thoughts. It is completely made in vanilla html,css,and js. Yeah, not much else to say.

projects.title: C# Console Dungeon Crawler
projects.shortDescription: A simple text-based dungeon crawler game.
projects.description: A C# project I made for class as well as to learn the language. It as attacking, defending and running mechanics as well as a shop and stats system. I had lots of fun making and its helped me expand my knowledge of C#.
